Name: Saving Animals
About the game: A nice arcade game in the 'ball breaking' genre. Little raccoon friends are in trouble. Save the trapped animals. Using the mouse, use the throw to knock down balls of a suitable color. You can swap the ball in your hands with the ball in the bag. Get bonuses for the perfect solution to the problem. Save your friends on many beautiful levels.
